duration_in_months: A new tendering process has been initiated
full_summary:
=================================
**Test Solicitation Notice**
=================================

### Tender Information

**Tender Title:** Test Solicitation for Resins (13111000)
**Reference Number:** WS3766419451
**Solicitation Number:** WS3766419451
**Publication Date:** November 27, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 23, 2022, at 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** December 19, 2022

**Tender Status:** Expired

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:** 
**Name:** Charette, John (SPAC/PSPC)
**Email:** john.charette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### End User Entities

* **End User Entities:** Department of National Defence (DND)

### Notice URL

### Regions

* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
